snippet.title: KARMA: The Dark World Gameplay trailer - Convergence Showcase
snippet.description:
An exclusive look at the gameplay for first-person psychological thriller KARMA: The Dark World, introduced by developers Pollard Studio. Get a glimpse of the game's twisted version of 1984 East Germany in this new trailer, revealed as part of the Convergence Showcase. Play it yourself in Steam Next Fest in October.

Wishlist it today: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1376200

#convergenceshow #indiegame
